hanzi-su-wiki:
期

Значения

Период, срок, ожидание, надежда

Мнемоника

Варвары регулярно нападали на Китай, и периодичность была связана с фазами луны 月. Опасаться, как бы не началось вторжение тех 其, соседей.

Варианты

朞

CONTEXT_sherlock:
期period
一个星期五的上午，天气很好。One Friday morning, the weather was fine.
今天是星期五，下个星期一以前我会处理完这个案子。”Today is Friday, and I will finish the case before next Monday. "
明天是星期六，后天是星期天，银行里的人都不上班。Tomorrow is Saturday and the day after tomorrow is Sunday. No one in the bank will go to work.
heisig_chinese_memo: The slowest remote chess game ever: a one month period of time between every move.
heisig_constituent: period, bushel basket, hamper, animal legs, eight, moon, month, flesh, part of the body
heisig_story: Bushel basket . . . month. As the month indicates, this has to do with periods of time.
koohiiStory1: The slowest remote chess game ever: a one month period between every move.
koohiiStory2: The girl´s panties are all in the bushel basket as it´s that time of the month again... her period.
jp_example_words:
画期(かっき): epoch-making
期(き): period, time
期日(きじつ): fixed date, settlement date
期末(きまつ): end of term
周期(しゅうき): cycle, period
末期(まっき): closing years (period days), last stage
延期(えんき): postponement, adjournment
学期(がっき): school term
期間(きかん): period, term
期限(きげん): term, period
期待(きたい): expectation, anticipation, hope
時期(じき): time, season, period
短期(たんき): short term
長期(ちょうき): long time period
定期(ていき): fixed term
定期券(ていきけん): commuter pass, season ticket
予期(よき): expectation, assume will happen, forecast
jp_readingExamples: 期間 (きかん), 期待 (きたい), 予期 (よき)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A crab left on the moon for a period of time will surely die. Crabs aren’t meant for the moon, let alone outer space. Why would you take a crab to the moon? You take it outside the spaceship for any period of time and it will surely die.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: I’m sure you’ve seen movies where people go out in space with no spacesuit. Now imagine this happening to the poor crab. It only takes a small period of time for the dark reaches of space to kill him.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: In order for this crab to live on the moon for any period of time, you’re going to need to put him in a special moon aquarium and lock the lid with a key (き). This crab is crafty, so after you lock it, take the key with you and don’t let it out of your sight for any period of time. This crab knows how to use a key.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine this crab floating around in an aquarium half filled with water in little to no gravity. The water is floating all about and the crab is confused as can be. He just wants the key so he can get out of this crazy moon box and back to the real ocean where he belongs.
Ru_trainchinese:

qī: (сч.слово) счетное слово для периодических событий или изданий
jī: (графема) (книжн.) полный год или месяц
Kanshudo_mnemonic: that (其) month (月) is a period of time
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The slowest remote chess game ever: a one month period of time between every move.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscription starts from " day ", " its " sound, or not from " day " but from " month ". " Day " and " Month " are both meaning symbols, indicating time, so the original meaning of " period " is period. Or from " its " from " Ji ", " Ji " is " their " Sheng Wen's.

The inscriptions indicate the period. Wu Wang Guangjian said: "The white period of the word", that is, the period of the Jisheng Ba (the eighth, ninth to fourteenth and fifth days of each month in the lunar calendar, see Wang Guowei). It also expressed the limit and time limit, Wang Ziwuding: "Ten thousand years are indefinite." Also used as a name.

"Said Wen": "Period, meeting also. From the sound of the moon. 𣅆, the ancient prose period is not from the day."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription starts from " day ", " its " sound, or not from " day " but from " month ". " Day " and " Month " are both meaning symbols, indicating time, so the original meaning of " period " is period.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「日」，「其」聲，或不從「日」而從「月」。「日」、「月」皆是義符，表示時間，故「期」的本義是時期。或不從「其」而從「丌」，「丌」是「其」的省文。

　　金文表示時期，吳王光鑑：「既字白期」，即既生霸(陰曆每月初八、九至十四、五日，參王國維)之期間。又表示極限、期限，王子午鼎：「萬年無期」。又用作人名。

　　《說文》：「期，會也。从月其聲。𣅆，古文期从日丌。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「日」，「其」聲，或不從「日」而從「月」。「日」、「月」皆是義符，表示時間，故「期」的本義是時期。

金文從「 日 」，「 其 」聲，或不從「 日 」而從「 月 」。「 日 」、「 月 」皆是義符，表示時間，故「 期 」的本義是時期。或不從「 其 」而從「 丌 」，「 丌 」是「 其 」的省文。 金文表示時期，吳王光鑑：「既字白期」，即既生霸(陰曆每月初八、九至十四、五日，參王國維)之期間。又表示極限、期限，王子午鼎：「萬年無期」。又用作人名。 《說文》：「期，會也。从月其聲。𣅆，古文期从日丌。」

" Day" and " Month" are both meaning symbols, indicating time, so the original meaning of " period" is period. Or from " its" from " Ji", " Ji" is " their" Sheng Wen's. The inscriptions indicate the period. Wu Wang Guangjian said: "The white period of the word", that is, the period of the Jisheng Ba (the eighth, ninth to fourteenth and fifth days of each month in the lunar calendar, see Wang Guowei). It also expressed the limit and time limit, Wang Ziwuding: "Ten thousand years are indefinite." Also used as a name. "Said Wen": "Period, meeting also. From the sound of the moon. 𣅆, the ancient prose period is not from the day."

期字的基本解释

期
qī
规定的时间，或一段时间：定期。限期。期限。学期。
量词，用于刊物或其他分期的事物：第五期。
盼望，希望：期望。期冀。期盼。期待。
限度：“征敛无期求索无度”。
必，决定：“期死，非勇也”。
〔期颐〕指人活到一百岁。
地质学上指在一个国境内或一个大区域内，小于“世”的地质年代单位。

期
jī
一周年，一整月：期年。期月。期服（古代丧服名，要穿一年）。

期字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qī］
［《廣韻》渠之切，平之，羣。］
(1)会；会合。
(2)邀约；约定。
(3)希望；企求。
(4)预知；料想。
(5)机运；际会。
(6)限，限度。
(7)必，必定。
(8)期限。
(9)百岁曰期。亦泛指老，高寿。
(10)预定的时间；选定的日子。
(11)指一段时间。
(12)待；看待。
(13)相当；相合。
(14)常。
(15)见“期期”。
(16)地质学上小于“世”的地质时代单位。
(17)量词。用于分期的事物。
(18)通“綦”。极。
(19)通“旗”。
(20)通“惎”。教。
(21)通“夔”。参见“期牛”。
(22)姓。参见“期思”。
[②]［jī］
［《廣韻》居之切，平之，見。］
“朞1”的繁体字。亦作“朞1”。“稘1”的古字。
(1)时间周而复始。分别指一周年，一个月或一整天。
(2)“期服”的省称。
(3)通“其”。句末语气助词。表疑问。

期字的英文翻译

◎ 期
a period of time, expect, sheduled time

期字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【月字部】　期； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页506第11
〔古文〕??【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?渠之切，音其。【說文】會也。【易·歸妹】歸妹愆期。　又【書·大禹謨】耄期倦于勤。【禮·曲禮】百年曰期頤。【註】期，猶要也。　又【書·大禹謨】期于予治。【傳】期，當也，當于治體。　又【前漢·路溫舒傳】刻木爲吏，期不對。【註】期，必也。　又【莊子·庚桑楚】志乎期費。【註】期，卒也。費，耗也。　又【莊子·寓言篇】無經緯本末以期年耆者，是非先也。【註】期，待也。　又【玉篇】時也，契約也。【廣韻】信也，限也。　又【爾雅·釋宮】八達謂之崇期。【註】四道交出。　又口吃。【史記·周昌傳】臣期期知其不可。　又【集韻】居之切，音姬。朞，亦書作期。【易·繫辭】凡三百有六十當期之日。又【左傳·昭二十三年】叔孫旦而立期焉。【註】從旦至莫爲期。【釋文】期，本又作朞。　又【韻補】叶渠尤切。【班婕妤·自悼賦】奉供養於東宮兮，托長信之末流。共灑埽於帷幄兮，永終死以爲期。　又叶巨椅切。【漢·淳于長夏承?】於?皇祖，天挺應期。佐時理物，紹從先軌。

期字的源字形

期字的起名意思

：规定的时间，或一段时间；盼望，希望；限度；决定。

period
Basic explanation of words
period
qī
A prescribed time, or period of time: regularly. deadline. the term. semester.
Quantifier, used in publications or other staging matters: the fifth issue.
Hope, hope: expect. Expectation. look forward to. look forward to.
Limits: "Conquer and search without time limit."
It must be decided: "If you die, you are not courageous."
[Dai Yi] refers to a person who lives to be a hundred years old.
Geology refers to a unit of geological age smaller than the "world" within a country or a large area.
period
jī
One anniversary, one full month: the term. Period month. Period clothing (the name of ancient mourning clothing, it must be worn for one year).
period
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qī］
["Guangyun" Qu Zhiqi, Ping Zhi, Qun. ]
(1) Meeting; meeting.
(2) Invitation; agreement.
(3) Hope; desire.
(4) Foresight; anticipation.
(5) Opportunity; chance.
(6) Limit, limit.
(7) Yes, definitely.
(8) Time limit.
(9) The hundred-year-old date. It also refers to old age and longevity.
(10) Scheduled time; selected day.
(11) Refers to a period of time.
(12) To be; to be treated.
(13) Equivalent; consistent.
(14) Often.
(15) See "Period".
(16) Geological age unit smaller than "world" in geology.
(17) Quantifiers. Things used for staging.
(18) Link "Qi". pole.
(19) Through the "flag".
(20) Through "brought". teach.
(21) Link "Kui". See "period cattle".
(22) Last name. See "Expectation".
[②]［jī］
["Guangyun" is cut, flat, see. ]
Traditional characters for "期1". Also known as "period 1". The ancient word "稘1".
(1) Time goes round and round. Refers to the first anniversary, a month or a whole day respectively.
(2) The provincial name of "period service".
(3) Link "其". Modal particles at the end of a sentence. Table question.

期
“期”是个形声字,本义是预定的时间。金文的“期”,上方的“其”是
声旁,下方的“日”是形旁,代表和时间相关。小家的“期”,将下方的“日”
换成了“月”,字义没有变化。“期”后来引申为约会,如佳期。现代汉语中,
“期”也表示盼望、希望,如期许、期冀、期望等。
隶书

период
период
Иба
(ци)
В древние времена мы часто сталкивались с неожиданными сюрпризами, но в наше время мы часто радуемся обещаниям, которые не обманут.
период
«Ци» - пиктофонетический символ, и его первоначальное значение - это определенное время.
В «периоде» бронзовой надписи «ци» вверху - это звуковая сторона, а «день» внизу - это сторона формы, которая представляет временную зависимость.
В «периоде» Сяоцзя «день» ниже заменен «месяцем», и значение этого слова не изменилось.
Позднее «Свидание» было продлено, как хорошее свидание.
В современном китайском языке «период» также означает надежду, надежду, например ожидание, ожидание, ожидание и т. Д.
период
Курсив
qī, jī
qī
1) назначенное время, срок; предел времени; на срок, к сроку, в срок; своевременно
如期完成 завершить в срок
过了期了 просрочено
无期 бессрочный
期决 заблаговременно (загодя) решить
2) период, цикл (напр. семестр, триместр, квартал); круг
暂定三个月为一期 временно установить трёхмесячный цикл (принять три месяца за отчётный период)
潜伏期 инкубационный период
学期 семестр; триместр
3) номер (периодического издания), выпуск
刚出了头一期 только что вышел первый номер
九月期 сентябрьский номер
4) уст. предел, мера, рамки, границы
万寿无期! долголетия Вам без конца и предела!
征敛无期 производить поборы без всякой меры
5) геол. век (элемент геохронологической шкалы)
土仑期 туронский век
6) надеяться на..., чаять, ожидать; рассчитывать на...
不期而然 получиться вопреки ожиданиям (неожиданно)
以期发展 в надежде обеспечить этим развитие (дела)
7) считать своим долгом; считать своей целью; стремиться к...
非期不同, 所急异务也 не в том дело, чтобы мы стремились к разным целям, а в том, что по-разному оцениваем срочность предстоящих задач
8) условиться, согласиться, договориться (о чем-л., особенно о встрече), назначить свидание (кому-л.); ждать (кого-л.)
jī
книжн. круглый период времени (век; год; сутки); круглый, целый; периодический, годичный (напр. о донесении); столетний (старец)
期岁 круглый год; целый месяц
耄期 старики в 80 — 100 лет
-----
1) * прекратить, остановить
期费 прекратить расходы, остановить утечку средств
2) * обязательно, непременно; необходимо, во что бы то ни стало; перед отрицанием: ни за что, ни в коем случае
期使天下... непременно заставить всю Поднебесную...
期无失礼 ни в коем случае не оказываться нарушителем этикета
3) jī * (сокр. вм. 期服) годичный траур
Radicals: 其, 月  (crab, moon)
Meaning Mnemonic
A crab left on the moon for a period of time will surely die. Crabs aren’t meant for the moon, let alone outer space. Why would you take a crab to the moon? You take it outside the spaceship for any period of time and it will surely die.
I’m sure you’ve seen movies where people go out in space with no spacesuit. Now imagine this happening to the poor crab. It only takes a small period of time for the dark reaches of space to kill him.
Reading Mnemonic
In order for this crab to live on the moon for any period of time, you’re going to need to put him in a special moon aquarium and lock the lid with a key (き). This crab is crafty, so after you lock it, take the key with you and don’t let it out of your sight for any period of time. This crab knows how to use a key.
Imagine this crab floating around in an aquarium half filled with water in little to no gravity. The water is floating all about and the crab is confused as can be. He just wants the key so he can get out of this crazy moon box and back to the real ocean where he belongs.

一个星期五的上午，天气很好。One Friday morning, the weather was fine.

今天是星期五，下个星期一以前我会处理完这个案子。”Today is Friday, and I will finish the case before next Monday. "

明天是星期六，后天是星期天，银行里的人都不上班。Tomorrow is Saturday and the day after tomorrow is Sunday. No one in the bank will go to work.
